name: Analyze CFSE Cell Proliferation
description: Analyze CFSE-labeled cell samples to quantify cell division and proliferation using flow cytometry data

params.name: fcs_file_path
params.description: Path to the FCS file containing CFSE-labeled cell data

params.name: cfse_channel
params.description: Flow cytometry channel name for CFSE fluorescence

params.name: lymphocyte_gate_json
params.description: Optional gating parameters for lymphocyte population (JSON object with 'fsc' and 'ssc' keys, leave blank for automatic gating)
